sentence: The favorite is a 10-term congressman Tim Ryan from Ohio’s 13th congressional district, who once confessed, “Anytime you’re a white guy [which he always is] in America you’re always learning and trying to better understand what people of color are going through and I don’t know if that journey ever ends.” He may be in for an education; his most serious challenger is Morgan Harper, a black woman.
author: Chris Roberts
title: Race Continues to Roil the Democrat Party

sentence: “Josh Mandel is the swamp.” - Democratic Senate candidate Morgan Harper “I am scared as a woman, as a Black person, as a daughter who has a mother who lives off of a monthly pension, of getting this guy anywhere near a seat of power in the United States Senate,” Harper said.
author: Liz Skalka
title: A Hard-Right Republican And A Progressive Debated. It Went As Well As You'd Expect.

sentence: An Ohio Senate debate between Republican candidate Josh Mandel and Democrat Morgan Harper devolved into name-calling and sparring with the audience Monday night, adding the latest explosive moment to the incendiary Ohio Senate race.
author: Tyler Olson
title: Mandel-Harper Ohio Senate debate goes off the rails in Cleveland

sentence: Don’t you suck up to him.” The second Josh Mandel v. Morgan Harper debate is going completely off the rails pic.twitter.com/DtZJZxmK40 — Tyler Buchanan (@Tylerjoelb) February 22, 2022 Promoted Content Mandel is just openly insulting Harper at this debate, to groans pic.twitter.com/YANuVOJn9X — Tyler Buchanan (@Tylerjoelb) February 22, 2022 After a debate in which Mandel called Harper dumb and scolded her for being “angry” about a dozen times, Harper refuses to shake his hand pic.twitter.com/yTuvfYDGzm — Tyler Buchanan (@Tylerjoelb) February 22, 2022 The full debate is in the video below: Harper posted a video message on Tuesday, blasting Mandel, calling him a sexist and a racist.
author: DML News App
title: VIDEO: Debate erupts into chaos as Republican compares Dem to ‘dumber’ AOC

sentence: This, like his first spots, is a world away from the invective that Mandel hurls at liberals on Twitter, and the dismissiveness he's shown Democrat Morgan Harper in two debates with her.
title: The Trailer: In Texas, safe-seat candidates fight about the best way to be partisan

author: Mica Soellner
title: ‘AOC of the Midwest’ seeks to battle Democratic establishment in bid for open Senate seat
